channel.title: [Help] I've configured summoning but
channel.description:
I put the IDs as #NAMEOFNPCORITEMHERE# (example: #Spirit Shard#) because I don't know the ID numbers for them.
Appearently Miss Silabsoft added the summoning items, but what are the ID #s?
Also, if I end up adding them to my client project, does anyone know the Jagex model numbers for the summoning familiars/pets?
